data.title: Queen Victoria Memorial Hospital
data.meta_site_name: Kent Community Health NHS Foundation Trust
data.text:
The UTC at this hospital is run by local GPs.

Community hospital

Please see our Queen Victoria Memorial Hospital page for more details.

Urgent Treatment Centre

Please call 01227 594756 for the UTC.

Daily: 8am to 8pm

X-ray: Monday to Thursday, 8.30am to 1pm and 2 to 4pm*

The UTC treats:

Sprains and strains

Dressings

Cuts and wounds

Minor head injuries

Wound infections

Children over one with a minor injury

Minor eye injuries and infections

Minor back, shoulder or chest injuries

Minor burns and scalds

Insect and animal bites

The UTC at this hospital is run by local GPs.

Our services at this location

Adult Community Speech and Language Therapy

Continence Service

Sexual Health

Please note there may be other services at this location, including services not provided by KCHFT.
